Methods in extensions with parameters of type AMLabel
 void AMLabel.bar(AMLabel new_bar)
          Set the bar for this label Required for instant access to the bar The has_bar is set by this method
 void Hierarchy.expand_collapse_decision(AMLabel original_label, AMLabel comparison_label, boolean entry, boolean hover, boolean is_left_up)
          Decide the action to be performed on this label We are concern here with expanding and collapsing, nothing else Also want to change the image according to the action This is generic and works for all levels and panel
 void AMLabel.image(AMLabel image)
          Set the image for this label Required so we can perform operations quickly on it The has_image is set by this method

          Generic adder function Takes away some of the duplicate code that is required to add contents to the different hierarchies
 

Methods in project with parameters of type AMLabel
 void View.addLabel(int this_level, AMLabel label, Hierarchy this_hierarchy)
          This actually adds the label First we need to check that the label will be placed in the correct position Level 1 labels at the top Level 2 labels on the second row Level 3 labels from row 3 - max rows
 java.lang.String Controller.alpha_code(AMLabel label, int index)
          Get the correct query for the codes
 void View.bar_edit(double count, Hierarchy hierarchy, AMLabel label)
          Setup the bar with new information This method is required as we now have information to add into the bar that we previously didn't have Also used to change the count of the bar when we decide to count a different category
 java.awt.Insets View.decideSpace(double count, float largest, float panel_width, int left_padding, AMLabel bar)
          Decide the external padding that is required for this object to be properly spaced The bar size should be relative to its size and to the largest The largest bar should reach all the way to the other side of the panel
 void Controller.increment_count(AMLabel label, java.lang.Double value, javax.swing.JPanel panel, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> map, boolean colour_only)
          Increment the sub_count of a bar
 void Controller.interaction(boolean is_hover, boolean is_entry, boolean is_left_up, AMLabel label)
          This method takes care of the interaction that will take place We decide here if we are expanding or collapsing We also decide if we will highlight the items or not
 void Controller.perform_action(Hierarchy hierarchy, AMLabel label, java.lang.String query, boolean is_image, boolean is_hover, boolean is_entry, boolean is_left_up)
          Perform a generic action of this label This is made so that any function can call this method
